div.bibl: The Chicago Jewish Chronicle, Wk. of February 6, 1931. Vol. 20, p.11.

body.p: Governor Emmerson has announced the appointment of Dr. Harry C. Rolnick of Chicago as consulting urologic surgeon for the State Industrial Commission.
Dr. Rolnick served in the World War as a captain in the Rainbow Division, and is now a member of the surgical staffs of Michael Reese and Mount Sinai Hospitals. He is also an author of text-books.
